EmailTemplate.subject: Virtual Desktop Strategy: Autonomic Methods for VDI Performance [Webinar]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/vdi-strategy-autonomic-methods-webinar?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wbnr-vdi-12072016&utm_content=11302016]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Gartner contends that the VDI market hit 76 million users this year, and will grow to 1.3 billion over the next three years. Although virtual desktops represent just a fraction of the world’s virtualized workload footprint, VDI architecture and resource consumption presents a uniquely challenging workload class with many permutations of possible implementation. Join us on December 7th at 12:00 PM ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/vdi-strategy-autonomic-methods-webinar?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wbnr-vdi-12072016&utm_content=11302016]]> to explore the unique challenges associated with VDI, and will demonstrate how Turbonomic’s autonomic approach to performance assurance and resource management can help your organization. During this webinar we will cover:
- Accelerate virtual desktop performance by 30% or more on 30% less infrastructure, entirely by properly sizing and placing VDI workloads - Confidently plan for and scale your VDI investment without overspending on delivery infrastructure - Accommodate unpredictable fluctuation in end-user activity and IO-storms through real-time decision automation - Maximize the number of virtual desktops managed per administrator - Hear firsthand from a top global consumer goods company that has completely automated its VDI operations with Turbonomic
- The Turbonomic Team
